question: I am a 24-year-old married woman and my husband and I were virgins when we got married.  For the last couple of years I have been having recurring yeast infections.  We do enjoy oral sex at some point almost every time we have sex.  I always wash afterward with warm water and no chemicals, but I seem to keep getting the yeast infections.  The biggest problem, though, is that the Monostat cream burns even more than the yeast infection itself.  It itches and burns so bad that I have to shower to get it off only minutes after I've applied it.  This makes it difficult to even treat the infection.I'm not sure what to do...if you have any suggestions, please let me know.  I am otherwise very healthy and active...no diabetes or other health problems.  Is there a different cream that won't burn and itch so bad?  Are there any natural remedies that actually work? Why does the Monostat burn so much?Thank you for your time!
title: Yeast Infections (I think)
